summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of INVERNESS DRIVE from Paisley Drive to Sand Point Way; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by constructing storm sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17214 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
